Title: Purge the Totems
Description:
The harpies have placed vile totems throughout the area to attain more power.

We must destroy those totems in order to debilitate our foes.

Take this torch and burn any totems you see. It is wise to weaken one's enemy before the fight even begins.
PortraitGiverText: These totems are empowering the harpies. They must be destroyed!
RewardText: The harpies grow weaker with their totems destroyed. Let us hope they realize that the Horde is a force to be reckoned with.
